dashboard.label: PANW Decrypt error
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_TLcLw64j":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_JErEAD99"},"showProgressBar":true,"showLastUpdated":true,"options":{"count":20}}},"dataSources":{"ds_JErEAD99":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"`index_paloalto` sourcetype="pan:decryption" src_ip=$token_src_ip$
| fillnull value=null
|search error!=null
| rex field=error "CA Issuer URL: (?<ca_url>[\w\d\:\/\%\-\.]+)"
| rex field=error "CA Issuer URL (truncated): (?<ca_url>[\w\d\:\/\%\-\.]+)"
| stats count by subject_cn error
| sort - count"},"name":"palo_decrypt_error"},"ds_Tm5T04Q3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=pan_logs sourcetype="pan:decryption"
| dedup src_ip
| fields + src_ip
| sort src_ip"},"name":"dropdown_filter_src_ip"},"ds_1XLXBNgQ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=pan_logs sourcetype="pan:decryption"
| dedup src_zone
| fields src_zone
| sort src_zone"},"name":"dropdown_src_zone"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_V8ng7NP7":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","defaultValue":"*","token":"token_src_ip"},"title":"Source IP","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Tm5T04Q3"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[["All"],["*"]],"label":">primary | seriesByName("src_ip") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("src_ip") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}},"input_auwRlyuW":{"options":{"items":[{"label":"All","value":"*"}],"defaultValue":"*","token":"token_src_zone"},"title":"Source zone","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_1XLXBNgQ"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{},"structure":[{"item":"viz_TLcLw64j","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":1200,"h":860}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_V8ng7NP7","input_auwRlyuW"]},"description":"","title":"PANW Decrypt error"}
